DataElement.preferredName: Palliative Radiation Therapy Complete Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Initiation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator to determine clinical trial participation for questions that address the completion of palliative radiation therapy before the administration of therapeutic agents, as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Palliative Radiation Therapy Complete Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Initiation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any radiation treatment done with the intent to relieve symptoms and reduce the suffering caused by the cancer, and not with the intent of curing the cancer._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any radiation treatment done with the intent to relieve symptoms and reduce the suffering caused by the cancer, and not with the intent of curing the cancer.

Concepts.definition: Any radiation treatment done with the intent to relieve symptoms and reduce the suffering caused by the cancer, and not with the intent of curing the cancer.

Property.preferredName: Complete Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Initiation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has received palli
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received palliative radiotherapy to a site of tumor, was radiation completed greater than or equal to 28 days prior to initiating treatment with nivolumab (Part A and B) or nivolumab + Ipilimumab (Part B) on this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received palliative radiotherapy for bone metastases, was it completed more than 2 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?
